room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard's Escape" by Port City Escape in Wilmington
review: This is a wonderful venue! We had my daughters 13th birthday in the Blackbeard's escape room. The girls had a fantastic time trying to escape. The staff was wonderful! That had a nice waiting room with games and such to keep the girls entertained before an after their escape experience! It was more than I could have asked for! Thanks again!

room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard's Escape" by Port City Escape in Wilmington
review: We had such a blast here on my daughters 21st birthday. We did Blackbeards room and it was definitely challenging but we managed to escape with a minute to spare!

room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard's Escape" by Port City Escape in Wilmington
review: We did the pirate escape room last week and everyone can't stop talking about how much fun it was. It was challenging but not impossible. Thanks for a fun experience Kris!

room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard's Escape" by Port City Escape in Wilmington
review: I've been dying to go to this place for quite some time and finally went with a group today. We did the pirate room. It was super fun and we all had a great time. The puzzles are hard at times but not so hard you feel they're impossible. The place is immaculately clean. Staff is consistently nice, pleasant, and patient (I had called them a few times before our visit). Couldn't be happier! I'll be back!
